  • Changelog

    Demo matched db entries

    demo_matched.Rd

    A simplified demo matched company data set to illustrate the manual matching process with loanbook. For details on included cases please refer to data generation script.

    Usage

    demo_matched

    Format

    A tibble with 9 rows and 5 variables:

    id

    a numeric id

    company_name

    name of company

    postcode

    postcode of company

    country

    country name in lowercase

    misc_info

    A placeholder column that holds additional information that human matchers would consider in matching

    company_alias

    name of the company, preprocessed

    id_tilt

    a numeric id in the tilt db

    company_name_tilt

    name of company

    misc_info_tilt

    A placeholder column that holds additional information that human matchers would consider in matching

    company_alias_tilt

    name of the company, preprocessed

    string_sim

    string similarity between aliased company name in the loanbook and aliase company name in tilt db

    suggest_match

    set to TRUE if string_sim is above a certain threshold

    accept_match

    manual decision to whether the company from the loanbook matches a comapny in the tilt db

    Examples

    demo_matched
#> # A tibble: 18 × 13
